data.topic: How would you rate your “settling down” process at TVSNext?
data.ques: How would you rate your “settling down” process at TVSNext?

questions.ques: HR continues to provide support in addressing my queries / needs from time to time
HR Representatives are always available to provide clarifications on policies and procedures
HR has helped me have a smooth and seamless transition into TVSNext
Do you have any suggestions to improve the HR interface with new joinees?

data.topic: How would you rate your induction into your department / project?
data.ques: How would you rate your induction into your department / project?

questions.ques: My roles and responsibilities have been made very clear to me
New joinees are inducted properly inducted into the team
My job is more or less what I envisioned it to be prior to joining
My skills are being utilized fully and appropriately
Do you have any suggestions to improve orientation to new joinees at the unit level?

data.topic: How would you rate the effectiveness of the Buddy Program?
data.ques: How would you rate the effectiveness of the Buddy Program?

questions.ques: I can still approach my buddy for any support
I was able to understand the organization and department better through my buddy
The Buddy Program is a well thought out process and should be continued for the benefit of all new joinees
Do you have any suggestions to improve the current buddy program?

data.topic: How would you rate the culture and environment at TVSNext?
data.ques: How would you rate the culture and environment at TVSNext?

questions.ques: TVSNext practices the open culture policy that it professes to have
The work environment is very professional and friendly
The Senior Management is very approachable
The communication channels are wide and open. There are sufficient forums to voice one’s opinion
The organization has met my expectations in terms of utilizing my capabilities (contribution to organizational initiatives)
Do you have any suggestions to positively impact the culture and environment at TVSNext?
